name: Mystic Push
description:
Controls

This game is only keyboard and mouse compatible.

ActionsKeys
MovementArrow Keys, WASD
Interact
Space, Enter, Z Key
Restart
R Key
Cheats
KeysSkip Level
End Key

Exiting the Game

If you're playing in the browser, you just need to press Esc to minimize from fullscreen, and then you can close the tab. Otherwise on Windows, use Alt+F4.

Credits
